nodes.description: Three to four armed men attacked the DIG police office with weapons and explosives.
nodes.support_text: “Three to four men carrying arms and explosives attacked the DIG police office. One suicide bomber blew himself up at the gate,” Lango said.

nodes.description: One suicide bomber detonated himself at the gate of the DIG office.

nodes.description: Nine police officers were killed in the terrorist attack, and another 21 were injured.
nodes.support_text: LORALAI: The death toll from a bomb and gun attack at the office of senior police official in Loralai rose to 9 with another 21 people succumbing to injuries, a provincial minister said.

nodes.description: DIG and 15 other police officers were safely rescued from the attack site.
nodes.support_text: Meanwhile, DIG and 15 other police officers were safely rescued from the attack site.

edges.support_text: “Three to four men carrying arms and explosives attacked the DIG police office. One suicide bomber blew himself up at the gate,” Lango said.
LORALAI: The death toll from a bomb and gun attack at the office of senior police official in Loralai rose to 9 with another 21 people succumbing to injuries, a provincial minister said.
“Three to four men carrying arms and explosives attacked the DIG police office. One suicide bomber blew himself up at the gate,” Lango said.
Two attackers, he said, were killed after an exchange of fire with security agencies.
The DIG office was cleared, he said.
Meanwhile, DIG and 15 other police officers were safely rescued from the attack site.
